articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Both physical and digital assets can be securely stored and showcased. Here's how the "concierge vaulting" system works.
articles.title: Americana Makes Its 'Phygital' Vault Service Available to the Public

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The Custodia CEO says The Federal Reserve welcoming a European firm but not hers is "very un-American."
articles.title: Caitlin Long: The Fed Has Become an 'Unmovable Mountain'

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Terra’s lawyers cited the Ripple XRP ruling in their latest filings, but the SEC says the ruling actually favors them.
articles.title: SEC Asserts Ripple XRP Case was 'Wrongly Decided', Signals Appeal

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also this week, the British treasury issued a firm no to those calling for crypto to be regulated as gambling.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Dip as Chainlink, XRP, XLM Lead Growth

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The House bill aims to give the crypto industry the regulatory clarity it's been waiting for, but legal experts say there’s reason to remain cautious.
articles.title: House Crypto Bill Won’t Restrain SEC and Could Threaten DeFi, Legal Experts Say

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Recording Academy CEO Harvey Mason Jr. defends the move to allow AI-assisted music in Grammy nominations, but said there needs to be oversight.
articles.title: Why the Grammys Will Allow Songs Created With AI Help—At Least for Now

articles.author: Genevieve Thiers
articles.description: Amid strikes that have shut down Hollywood, Entertainmint CEO Genevieve Thiers argues that Film3 points the way to a more equitable path forward.
articles.title: It's Time to Flip the Hollywood Script on Its Head

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: OpenAI wants to gain as many ChatGPT users as possible, and is going beyond web browsers by adding an Android app to its stable.
articles.title: OpenAI Brings ChatGPT to Android as AI Boom Continues

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Degens betting on the price of the HAMS token might be doing even better than degens betting crypto on the actual hamster races.
articles.title: Did You Miss Out on Hamster Races, Anon? HAMS Token Jumps 783%

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The Open Source Initiative told Meta’s Chief AI Scientist that the model they are promoting as Open Source is not really open source.
articles.title: Is Meta's ChatGPT Killer Really Open Source?

articles.description: Industry leaders commit to safe, secure, and transparent development of artificial intelligence in agreement with the Biden administration.
articles.title: OpenAI, Google, Microsoft Promise White House to Keep AI Safe

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Long pointed to public documents showing Adyen, a FedNow early adopter, got a federal master account in July 2020—a year before it had a U.S. branch.
articles.title: Fed Bent the Rules in Rollout of Instant Payment Service FedNow, Says Custodia CEO

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: U.S. District Judge William Orrick said artists should "provide more facts" to back up claims about alleged copyright infringement by AI companies
articles.title: Human Artists Lose Ground in Legal Battle Against AI

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Gabriel Bankman-Fried allegedly planned to use Nauru as a shelter for effective altruists in the event of a global catastrophe.
articles.title: FTX Lawsuit Alleges SBF Brother Planned to Turn Island Nation Into Doomsday Bunker

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Ilya Lichtenstein and his wife, Heather Morgan, will appear before a judge on August 3 and could face up to 20 years in prison.
articles.title: Bitfinex Hackers Agree to Forfeit Billions in Bitcoin in Plea Deal

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: McDonald’s is the latest major brand to debut an immersive metaverse game experience—with NFT and crypto rewards, too.
articles.title: Welcome to McNuggets Land: McDonald’s Launches Metaverse Game in ‘The Sandbox’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The new DeFi protocol, which went live in March, has lost more than 1,700 Ethereum.
articles.title: Hackers Drain $3 Million in Ethereum From DeFi Protocol Conic Finance

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried attempted to discredit Caroline Ellison by sharing her personal documents to the media, the DOJ alleges.
articles.title: DoJ Accuses SBF of Leaking Caroline Ellison's Diary to 'Discredit a Witness' in FTX Trial

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The latest launch "will push the boundaries of what NFT marketplaces can do,” said Argent co-founder Julien Niset.
articles.title: ‘Smart Wallet’ Provider Argent Launches NFT Marketplace Unframed on Starknet

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: As China enters the summer vacation months, the government is actively promoting the digital yuan to travelers.
articles.title: China Targets Travelers With Digital Yuan as Tourist Season Looms

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: An NFT released by former First Lady Melania Trump features an iconic NASA photo, despite the agency's explicit prohibition on NFTs.
articles.title: Space Case? Melania Trump's Apollo 11 NFT Defies NASA Rules

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Authorities believe there may be a connection between several robberies that have occurred in Canada involving thieves searching for private keys linked to crypto funds.
articles.title: Canadians Are Having Crypto Stolen From Their Homes, Police Say

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Blockchain analytics firm Elliptic found that most crypto funds used in the fentanyl trade can be traced to centralized exchanges.
articles.title: Crypto Funds Linked to Fentanyl Trade Come Mostly From Centralized Exchanges: Elliptic

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: PREVIEW: Fast-paced battle royale game Mighty Action Heroes doesn't break new ground, but it offers up fun moments in its open beta.
articles.title: 'Mighty Action Heroes' Puts a Fun Battle Royale Shooter in Your Browser

articles.description: A new site is gripping crypto gamblers by letting them bet cryptocurrency on streamed races between members of the fluffy rodent breed.
articles.title: You Can Now Bet Crypto on Hamster Races. What Could Go Wrong?

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The bill is the product of extensive work by lawmakers on Capitol Hill.
articles.title: House Republicans Introduce Bill That Aims to Bring Regulatory Clarity to Crypto

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: OpenAI unveils a "custom instruction" feature for ChatGPT users to enable personalized responses from the AI chatbot.
articles.title: You Can Now Customize AI Chatbot ChatGPT to Respond the Way You Want

articles.description: In diary entries seen by the New York Times, Ellison also reportedly said it felt great when FTX blew up.
articles.title: Caroline Ellison Admits She Wasn’t 'Well Suited' to Run Alameda Research

articles.description: Critics say new legislation will grant the U.S. Treasury overbroad authority while violating freedom of speech.
articles.title: Coin Center Blasts 'Messy and Unconstitutional' Senate DeFi Bill

articles.description: Security researchers see ChatGPT as a tool with plenty of potential, but it's dogged by how inaccurate it is at diagnosing security flaws.
articles.title: ChatGPT Isn't All That Great at Cybersecurity: Immunefi

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: But as the foundation told Decrypt in an email, that’s “no guarantees of future network performance.”
articles.title: Solana Is Down Meme Dead? Devs Say Network Had 100% Uptime Since Feb

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: “We will create generative AI art with our own GPUs, on our own fine-tuned model of Stable Diffusion," the CEO told Decrypt.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Hive Is Using Old Ethereum Rigs and AI to Make Ordinals Art

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: High-end Coutts—which counts members of the Royal Family among its clientele—faced blow back after Farage said his account was closed over political views.
articles.title: Coutts Apologizes for 'Unbanking' Bitcoin-Friendly Nigel Farage

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: His ill-fated stint at Binance US wasn't in a news release, which focused on his time as Coinbase's CLO and acting U.S. Comptroller of the Currency.
articles.title: Former Binance US CEO Brian Brooks Joins Crypto Asset Manager Hashdex

articles.author: Lucy Harley-McKeown
articles.description: The 20,000-strong Mythics NFT collection will be revealed gradually over the span of months as Moonbirds and Oddities holders claim them.
articles.title: Moonbirds Mythics NFTs Begin Reveal That Will Last at Least 200 Days

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The government argued that classifying crypto asset trading as gambling would create a misalignment with global standards.
articles.title: UK Government Rejects Proposal to Classify Crypto as Gambling

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Congressman Ritchie Torres doubled down on his recent criticisms of Securities and Exchange Commission chair Gary Gensler.
articles.title: Congressman Ritchie Torres: SEC Chair Gensler 'Intent on Sabotaging' Crypto Industry

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos

articles.description: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.
articles.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers

articles.description: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.
articles.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder

articles.description: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
articles.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?

articles.description: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.
articles.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.
articles.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan

articles.description: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.
articles.title: Why Legend of Arcadia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.
articles.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.
articles.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns

articles.description: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.
articles.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads

articles.description: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.
articles.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche

articles.description: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.
articles.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach

articles.description: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.
articles.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming

articles.description: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.
articles.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
